statements: UPDATE wallet_keys SET private_key = 'new_private_key_value', public_key = 'new_public_key_value' WHERE wallet_id = '87f892b5-3e53-4d0d-90a3-861c1c7dfe4f';

UPDATE wallet_keys SET public_key = 'updated_public_key_value', private_key = 'updated_private_key_value', encryption_key = '\x12AB34CD56EF78' WHERE wallet_id = 'e8c69d0c-50b7-470c-a746-19b7f89d0b9b';
UPDATE wallet_keys SET encryption_key = '123456' WHERE wallet_id = '6a1c8b0b-f2ab-4273-b58f-7268b7776973';
UPDATE wallet_keys SET private_key = 'abcd1234', public_key = 'efgh5678' WHERE wallet_id = '3d7363d0-996a-4efa-8496-b07d9580c9c1';
UPDATE wallet_keys SET wallet_name = 'Savings' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 250.75, created_at = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE tx_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-11g7-h8i9-901j2345k678';
UPDATE wallet_keys SET wallet_name = 'New Wallet Name', private_key = 'new_private_key' WHERE id = '9e62b6bf-47af-48bc-a8f0-fccf08c7e952';
UPDATE transactions SET recipient_address = 'New Address', amount = 1000.50 WHERE tx_id = '65fd2038-1f25-4964-825f-6470d2844916';
UPDATE users SET password_hash='newPassword123' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE encryption_logs SET encrypted_data='New Data', encryption_timestamp='2022-10-05 15:30:00' WHERE log_id=5;
UPDATE private_keys SET private_key = 'new_private_key_value' WHERE wallet_address = 'example_wallet_address'
UPDATE users SET password_hash = 'new_password_hash_value' WHERE username = 'example_username'
UPDATE private_keys SET public_key = 'new_public_key', private_key = 'new_private_key' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wallets SET balance = 100.50 WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE private_keys SET public_key = 'new_public_key_value' WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE wallets SET balance = balance - 10 WHERE user_id = 2
UPDATE wallet_private_keys SET private_key = 'new_private_key_value' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wallet_logs SET operation = 'update' , log_message = 'Updated log entry' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE wallet_private_keys SET private_key = 'new_private_key_value', encryption_key = 'new_encryption_key_value' WHERE user_id = 101 AND id = 1;
UPDATE wallet_transactions SET amount = 200.50, transaction_date = '2023-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 501;
